copy.titleNormal: You've been a Member of Pixie Hollow for
copy.title0Day: We're so excited you have become a member!

level.mainCopy: As a thank you for becoming a member, we have given you a wooden Member Pin!
Your wooden Member Pin now has lovely copper plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
Your copper Member Pin now has beautiful silver plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
Your silver Member Pin now has gorgeous gold plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
